Key Match Events: The Bulls lost Cavaliers guard Caris LeVert, who knocked down a corner three-pointer after a defensive breakdown
The Bulls won the preseason game 139-137 against the Cavaliers in overtime
Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls feel good about their three-point attack and pace, and they know how important it is for them to attack teams in transition and to make the three-pointer a weapon
Miscellaneous Highlights: Assistant coach Wes Unseld Jr. called a timeout immediately after the defensive breakdown
The Bulls still searching for answers to unlock forward Patrick Williams
Others: The game was a preseason finale against the Cavaliers
